content: Fix MembersList.js horizontal overflow - optimize table for 390px viewport (244px overflow)
Add loading skeletons to Dashboard tab content using LoadingState component
Add EmptyState component to MembersList with Users icon and 'Add First Member' action
Improve MembersList search/filter bar with responsive layout and loading indicators
Run esbuild compile check to ensure no syntax errors
Take screenshots at 390px, 768px, 1024px to verify responsive layouts
Call testing_agent for comprehensive Phase 2 testing (frontend + backend)
Fix any bugs found by testing agent before proceeding to Phase 3
